creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Paul O'Connor
description: 3 strips (2 narrow flanking a wide strip) sewn together; tan ground with geometric (primarily zigzag and diamond) supplementary weft patterning in red and blue; tan, red and blue twisted fringe on each short side. Woven fabric
markings: On a pink paper fragment, stapled at one short end, in blue ink: NU-4,700/
title: Ceremonial textile (Chagsi Pangkheb)
